description: Amazon Web Services Systems Manager calls this API operation when displaying all Application Manager OpsMetadata objects or blobs.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters to limit the number of OpsMetadata objects returned by the call. (dict) --- A filter to limit the number of OpsMetadata objects displayed. A filter key. A filter value. (string) ---

nested_items.name: OpsMetadataList
nested_items.description: Returns a list of OpsMetadata objects.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Application Manager application.

nested_items.name: OpsMetadataArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the OpsMetadata Object or blob.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date the OpsMetadata object was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedUser
nested_items.description: The user name who last updated the OpsMetadata object.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date the OpsMetadata objects was created.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
